verses.verse: Now <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> <S%H3045>perceived<s%> that the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> was toward <S%H53>Absalom<s%>.

And <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H8620>Tekoah<s%>, and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> thence a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, I pray thee, feign thyself to be a <S%H56>mourner<s%>, and put <S%H3847>on<s%> now <S%H60>mourning<s%> <S%H899>apparel<s%>, and <S%H5480>anoint<s%> not thyself with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, but be as a <S%H802>woman<s%> that had a <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%> <S%H56>mourned<s%> for the <S%H4191>dead<s%>:
And <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> on this <S%H1697>manner<s%> unto him. So <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> in her <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

And when the <S%H802>woman<s%> of <S%H8621>Tekoah<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>, she <S%H5307>fell<s%> on her <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>, and did <S%H7812>obeisance<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3467>Help<s%>, O <S%H4428>king<s%>. Help: Heb. Save

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, What aileth thee? And she <S%H559>answered<s%>, I am <S%H61>indeed<s%> a <S%H490>widow<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%>, and mine <S%H376>husband<s%> is <S%H4191>dead<s%>.

And thy <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and they <S%H8147>two<s%> strove <S%H5327>together<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and there was none to <S%H5337>part<s%> them, but the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H259>other<s%>, and <S%H4191>slew<s%> him. none: Heb. no deliverer between them

And, behold, the whole <S%H4940>family<s%> is <S%H6965>risen<s%> against thine <S%H8198>handmaid<s%>, and they <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5414>Deliver<s%> him that <S%H5221>smote<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>, that we may <S%H4191>kill<s%> him, for the <S%H5315>life<s%> of his <S%H251>brother<s%> whom he <S%H2026>slew<s%>; and we will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> the <S%H3423>heir<s%> also: and so they shall <S%H3518>quench<s%> my <S%H1513>coal<s%> which is <S%H7760>left<s%>, and shall not <S%H7604>leave<s%> to my <S%H376>husband<s%> neither <S%H8034>name<s%> nor <S%H7611>remainder<s%> <S%H6440>upon<s%> the <S%H127>earth<s%>. upon: Heb. upon the face of the earth
And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H802>woman<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%> to thine <S%H1004>house<s%>, and I will give <S%H6680>charge<s%> concerning thee.

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> of <S%H8621>Tekoah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, My <S%H113>lord<s%>, O <S%H4428>king<s%>, the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> be on me, and on my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>: and the <S%H4428>king<s%> and his <S%H3678>throne<s%> be <S%H5355>guiltless<s%>.
And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Whosoever <S%H1696>saith<s%> ought unto thee, <S%H935>bring<s%> him to me, and he shall not <S%H5060>touch<s%> thee any <S%H3254>more<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> she, I pray thee, let the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, that thou wouldest not suffer the <S%H1350>revengers<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> any <S%H7235>more<s%>, lest they <S%H8045>destroy<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>, there shall not one <S%H8185>hair<s%> of thy <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%>. that: Heb. that the revenger of blood do not multiply to destroy

Then the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Let thine <S%H8198>handmaid<s%>, I pray thee, <S%H1696>speak<s%> one <S%H1697>word<s%> unto my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Say <S%H1696>on<s%>.

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Wherefore then hast thou <S%H2803>thought<s%> such a thing against the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>? for the <S%H4428>king<s%> doth <S%H1696>speak<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%> as one which is <S%H818>faulty<s%>, in that the <S%H4428>king<s%> doth not fetch home <S%H7725>again<s%> his <S%H5080>banished<s%>.

For we must <S%H4191>needs<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>, and are as <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H5064>spilt<s%> on the <S%H776>ground<s%>, which cannot be gathered up <S%H622>again<s%>; neither doth <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5375>respect<s%> any <S%H5315>person<s%>: yet doth he <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H4284>means<s%>, that his <S%H5080>banished<s%> be not <S%H5080>expelled<s%> from him. neither: or, because God hath not taken away his life, he hath also devised means, etc

Now therefore that I am <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> of this <S%H1697>thing<s%> unto my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, it is because the <S%H5971>people<s%> have made me <S%H3372>afraid<s%>: and thy <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, I will now <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>; it may be that the <S%H4428>king<s%> will <S%H6213>perform<s%> the <S%H1697>request<s%> of his <S%H519>handmaid<s%>.

For the <S%H4428>king<s%> will <S%H8085>hear<s%>, to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> his <S%H519>handmaid<s%> out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> that would <S%H8045>destroy<s%> me and my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> out of the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

Then thine <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H1697>word<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> shall now be <S%H4496>comfortable<s%>: for as an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, so is my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H8085>discern<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>bad<s%>: therefore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> will be with thee. comfortable: Heb. for rest to discern: Heb. to hear

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H802>woman<s%>, <S%H3582>Hide<s%> not from me, I pray thee, the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that I shall <S%H7592>ask<s%> thee. And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Let my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> now <S%H1696>speak<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Is not the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab<s%> with thee in all this? And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, As thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>, my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H376>none<s%> <S%H786>can<s%> turn to the right <S%H3231>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8041>left<s%> from ought that my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%>: for thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3097>Joab<s%>, he <S%H6680>bade<s%> me, and he <S%H7760>put<s%> all these <S%H1697>words<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of thine <S%H8198>handmaid<s%>:

<S%H5668>To<s%> fetch <S%H5437>about<s%> this <S%H6440>form<s%> of <S%H1697>speech<s%> hath thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%>: and my <S%H113>lord<s%> is <S%H2450>wise<s%>, according to the <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H3045>know<s%> all things that are in the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3097>Joab<s%>, Behold now, I have <S%H6213>done<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%>: <S%H3212>go<s%> therefore, <S%H7725>bring<s%> the young <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>.

And <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%> on his <S%H6440>face<s%>, and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself, and <S%H1288>thanked<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>: and <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, To <S%H3117>day<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> that I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%>, my <S%H113>lord<s%>, O <S%H4428>king<s%>, in that the <S%H4428>king<s%> hath <S%H6213>fulfilled<s%> the <S%H1697>request<s%> of his <S%H5650>servant<s%>. thanked: Heb. blessed his servant: or, thy servant
So <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1650>Geshur<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Let him <S%H5437>turn<s%> to his own <S%H1004>house<s%>, and let him not <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%>. So <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H5437>returned<s%> to his own <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> not the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%>.

But in all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> there was <S%H376>none<s%> to be so <S%H3966>much<s%> <S%H1984>praised<s%> as <S%H53>Absalom<s%> for his <S%H3303>beauty<s%>: from the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of his <S%H7272>foot<s%> even to the crown of his <S%H6936>head<s%> there was no <S%H3971>blemish<s%> in him. But: Heb. And as Absalom there was not a beautiful man in all Israel to praise greatly

And when he <S%H1548>polled<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%>, (for it was at every <S%H3117>year's<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H7093>end<s%> that he <S%H1548>polled<s%> it: because the hair was <S%H3513>heavy<s%> on him, therefore he <S%H1548>polled<s%> it:) he <S%H8254>weighed<s%> the <S%H8181>hair<s%> of his <S%H7218>head<s%> at two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> after the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H68>weight<s%>.

And unto <S%H53>Absalom<s%> there were <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H8559>Tamar<s%>: she was a <S%H802>woman<s%> of a <S%H3303>fair<s%> <S%H4758>countenance<s%>.
So <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> two <S%H3117>full<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> not the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%>.

Therefore <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> for <S%H3097>Joab<s%>, to have <S%H7971>sent<s%> him to the <S%H4428>king<s%>; but he <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H935>come<s%> to him: and when he sent <S%H7971>again<s%> the second <S%H8145>time<s%>, he <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H935>come<s%>.

Therefore he <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, <S%H7200>See<s%>, <S%H3097>Joab's<s%> <S%H2513>field<s%> is <S%H413>near<s%> <S%H3027>mine<s%>, and he hath <S%H8184>barley<s%> there; <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H3341>set<s%> it on <S%H784>fire<s%>. And <S%H53>Absalom's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H3341>set<s%> the <S%H2513>field<s%> on <S%H784>fire<s%>. near: Heb. near my place

Then <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H53>Absalom<s%> unto his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Wherefore have thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H3341>set<s%> my <S%H2513>field<s%> on <S%H784>fire<s%>?

And <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> <S%H3097>Joab<s%>, Behold, I <S%H7971>sent<s%> unto thee, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H935>Come<s%> hither, that I may <S%H7971>send<s%> thee to the <S%H4428>king<s%>, to <S%H559>say<s%>, Wherefore am I <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H1650>Geshur<s%>? it had been <S%H2896>good<s%> for me to have been there still: now therefore let me <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%>; and if there <S%H3426>be<s%> any <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> in me, let him <S%H4191>kill<s%> me.

So <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and <S%H5046>told<s%> him: and when he had <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H53>Absalom<s%>, he <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself on his <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>: and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5401>kissed<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%>.
